title: It Took MONTHS to Solve This WiFi Problem but I DID! (maybe... check pinned comment)

Problem is, it's really a Wi-Fi issue, and diagnosing it - even with cool Wi-Spy tools from MetaGeek - could be quite the rabbithole...
